message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. However, I have a limited budget in mind for this purchase. Would you consider a lower price of $6,000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still looking to get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $8,500. This is a one-time offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hello Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. However, $8,500 is still a bit high for my budget.  Could we possibly settle at $7,000? I believe that would be a fair compromise.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go below $9,000. This is my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer it to you for $8,750. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
